subtopics.name: For all caches
subtopics.testCases:
# Implicit Caching>For all caches>
## 1.1.1 Implicit caching: No time information
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -p 5 -e 'ch:false;st:200'
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json'

## 1.1.2 Implicit caching: Status code 201
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'cc:public;st:201' -e 'ch:false;st:201'
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'cc:public;st:201' -e 'ch:true;st:201'

## 1.1.3 Implicit caching: Last-Modified one hour before
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'lm:-3600' -e 'ch:false;st:200'
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'lm:-3600'

## 1.1.4 Implicit caching: Last-Modified one hour in the future
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'lm:3600' -e 'ch:false;st:200'
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'lm:3600'

## 1.1.5 Implicit caching: public and Last-Modified one hour before
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'cc:public;lm:-3600' -e 'ch:false;st:200'
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'cc:public;lm:-3600'

## 1.1.6 Implicit caching: public
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'cc:public' -e 'ch:false;st:200'
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'cc:public'

## 1.1.7 Implicit caching: public and Last-Modified one hour before
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'cc:public;lm:-3600' -e 'ch:false;st:200'
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'cc:public;lm:-3600'

## 1.1.8 Implicit caching: public and Last-Modified one hour in the future
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'cc:public;lm:3600' -e 'ch:false;st:200'
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'cc:public;lm:3600'

## 1.1.9 Implicit validation: ETag
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'et:123' -e 'ch:false;st:200'
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'et:123' -e 'ch:true;st:200'

## 1.1.10 Implicit validation: ETag and Last-Modified one hour before
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'et:123;lm:-3600' -e 'ch:false;st:200'
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'et:123;lm:-3600' -e 'ch:true;st:200'

## 1.1.11 Implicit validation: ETag and Last-Modified one hour in the future

## 1.1.12 Implicit validation: ETag and max-age=5

## 1.1.13 Implicit validation: ETag and Expires in 5 seconds

GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'et:123;exp=5' -p 7 -e 'ch:true;st:200'

## 1.1.14 Implicit validation: Last-Modified 1 hour before and max-age=5

# Security>Attack vectors>
## 7.5.1 Attack vectors: Set-Cookie Attack, max-age=70
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'cc:max-age=70;sc:random'
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'cc:max-age=70'

## 7.5.2 Attack vectors: Set-Cookie Attack, s-maxage=70
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'cc:s-maxage=70;sc:random'
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'cc:s-maxage=70'

## 7.5.3 Attack vectors: Set-Cookie Attack, expires in 70 seconds
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'exp:70;sc:random'
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'exp:70'

## 7.5.4 Attack vectors: Web Deception Attack Test 1, no-store
GET /rsc.png -c 'ac:image/png' -s 'cc:no-store'
GET /rsc.png -c 'ac:image/png' -s 'cc:no-store'

## 7.5.5 Attack vectors: Web Deception Attack Test 2, max-age=0
GET /rsc.png -c 'ac:image/png' -s 'cc:max-age=0'
GET /rsc.png -c 'ac:image/png' -s 'cc:max-age=0'

## 7.5.6 Attack vectors: Web Deception Attack Test 3, s-maxage=0
GET /rsc.png -c 'ac:image/png' -s 'cc:s-maxage=0'
GET /rsc.png -c 'ac:image/png' -s 'cc:s-maxage=0'

## 7.5.7 Attack vectors: Web Deception Attack Test 4, expires 5 seconds before
GET /rsc.png -c 'ac:image/png' -s 'exp:-5'
GET /rsc.png -c 'ac:image/png' -s 'exp:-5'

## 7.5.8 Attack vectors: HTTP Request Smuggeling
GET /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'cc:max-age=10;cl:10;cl:12'
POST /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'cc:max-age=10;cl:10;cl:12'
PUT /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'cc:max-age=10;cl:10;cl:12'
DELETE /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'cc:max-age=10;cl:10;cl:12'
PATCH /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'cc:max-age=10;cl:10;cl:12'
OPTIONS /rsc -c 'ac:application/json' -s 'cc:max-age=10;cl:10;cl:12'
